text: The 2016 Ivan Hlinka Memorial Tournament was an under-18 international ice hockey tournament held in Břeclav, Czech Republic and Bratislava, Slovakia from 8 to 13 August 2016. ==Preliminary round== All times are Central European Summer Time (UTC+2). ===Group A=== ===Group B=== ==Final round== ===Seventh place game=== ===Fifth place game=== ===Semifinals=== ===Bronze medal game=== ===Gold medal game=== ==Final standings== {| class="wikitable" style="border:1px solid #AAAAAA;font-size:90%" |-bgcolor="#E4E4E4" !style="border-bottom:1px solid #AAAAAA" width=40|Rk. !style="border- bottom:1px solid #AAAAAA" width=120|Team |- bgcolor="#F7F6A8" | align="center" style="height:23px"| || |- bgcolor="#DCE5E5" | align="center" style="height:23px"| || |- bgcolor="#FFDAB9" | align="center" style="height:23px"| || |- style="background:#ffffff;" |align="center"| 4. || |- style="background:#ffffff;" |align="center"| 5. || |- style="background:#ffffff;" |align="center"| 6. || |- style="background:#ffffff;" |align="center"| 7. || |- style="background:#ffffff;" |align="center"| 8. || |} ==See also== *2016 IIHF World U18 Championships *2016 World Junior Championships ==External links== * Ivan Hlinka Memorial 2016 * U18 Ivan Hlinka Memorial 2016 Ivan Hlinka Memorial Tournament 2016 Category:International ice hockey competitions hosted by Slovakia Category:International ice hockey competitions hosted by the Czech Republic Ivan Ivan
title: 2016 Ivan Hlinka Memorial Tournament
